properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 4 at 11:17AM AKST until February 5 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow, blowing snow, and dangerous wind chills occurring.
Cold wind chills 50 to 60 below zero will cause frostbite in as
little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.

* WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast.

* WHEN...Until 6 PM Wednesday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities of one mile
or less at times.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST WEDNESDAY
